name: Project C.L.A.R.A
description:
Playthrough Video: Game Premise

The world is threatened by Neonic enemies, prepare to battle to the beat of the music in this rhythm based hack & slash! Protect Centralta City from Neonics by using your attacks as Agent Clara Nett!

Key Features
  • Attack to the beat of the music!
  • Perform combos to increase your score!
  • Fight against Neonics in Combat arenas.
  • Attack on the ground or take your battle to the air!
Project Brief

This project was created as part of a final year university project at the University of South Wales, in collaboration with students from Game Art, Animation and Sound design courses. The module lasted from September 2021 to May 2021. Teams had to initially pitch two game ideas and then have their game narrowed down by the course lecturing staff.
